member.name: F:NetIRC.Channel.BanList
member.summary: A list of masks that cannot be allowed in the channel.

member.name: F:NetIRC.Channel.ExceptList
member.summary: A list of masks that are allowed in the channel, even if they match the masks in the BanList.

member.name: F:NetIRC.Channel.InviteList
member.summary: A list of masks that are allowed in the channel, even if the channel is invite-only.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.Name
member.summary: Name of the channel without its prefix

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.FullName
member.summary: Full name of the channel with it's prefix (usually '#')

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.IsAnonymous
member.summary: The channel is anonymous and all messages sent by users have an anonymous mask.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.IsInviteOnly
member.summary: The channel will only allow users in by invite.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.IsModerated
member.summary: The channel will only allow users with a rank of voice or above to speak.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.NoOutsideMessages
member.summary: The channel will prevent anyone who is not in the channel from sending messages.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.IsQuiet
member.summary: The channel will not send information about user joins, parts or nick changes.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.IsPrivate
member.summary: The channel is omitted from queries like WHOIS.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.IsSecret
member.summary: The channel is omitted from queries like TOPIC, LIST, and NAMES.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.ServerReop
member.summary: The channel will reop some or all of its inhabitants after it has lost its channel operators for longer than the reop delay.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.IsTopicLocked
member.summary: The channel restricts the TOPIC command to operators.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.Key
member.summary: The key that is required to join the channel.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Channel.UserLimit
member.summary: The limit on the amount of users that can join the channel. A UserLimit of -1 means that a limit is not set.

member.name: M:NetIRC.Client.Connect(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,NetIRC.User)
member.summary: Connect to a specified .
member.param: The host of the server to connect to.
The port to connect to on the server.
True for SSL, false if not.
The NetIRC.User to use for connecting to the server.

member.name: M:NetIRC.Client.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects the connected user forcefully.

member.name: M:NetIRC.Client.JoinChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Join a channel specified by the .

member.name: M:NetIRC.Client.JoinChannel(NetIRC.Channel)
member.summary: Join a specified channel based on the given Channel object.
member.param: The Channel to be used for connecting.

member.name: M:NetIRC.Client.LeaveChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Leave a channel specified by the .

member.name: M:NetIRC.Client.LeaveChannel(NetIRC.Channel)
member.summary: Leave a specified channel based on the given Channel object.

member.name: M:NetIRC.Client.RegisterMessage(System.Type)
member.summary: Registers a message that will be checked when new messages are received.
member.param: The type of the Message object that messages will be checked against.

member.name: M:NetIRC.Client.Send(NetIRC.Messages.ISendMessage)
member.summary: Send a message to the connected server.
member.param: The NetIRC.SendMessage instance to be sent.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Client.HostName
member.summary: The hostname of the server.

member.name: P:NetIRC.Client.Port
member.summary: The port of the server.

member.summary: Gets or generates a User object from the UserFactory

member.summary: Gets or generates a User object from the UserFactory

member.summary: Gets the User who sent the message or null

member.summary: Gets the Channel the message is targeted at or null

member.summary: Determines whether the given userMask is valid

member.summary: Determines whether the message is originated from a user

member.summary: Determines whether the message is targeted at a channel

member.summary: Checks if the message is a numeric one

member.summary: Gets the CTCP message or null

member.summary: Checks if the message is a Client-to-client protocol message

member.name: F:NetIRC.User.RankChars
member.summary: A dictionary that represents the characters associated with specific ranks in WHO and NAMES messages.

member.name: F:NetIRC.User.RankModes
member.summary: A dictionary representing the characters that are used to change a user's rank through channel modes.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.NickName
member.summary: The nickname that the user will be associated with.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.UserName
member.summary: The username (sometimes called ident) that is associated with the user.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.HostName
member.summary: The hostname that is attached to the user.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.RealName
member.summary: The real name that the user specified when connecting.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.IsAway
member.summary: The user is away.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.IsInvisible
member.summary: The user is marked as invisible.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.IsReceivingWallOps
member.summary: The user is receiving WallOps.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.IsRestricted
member.summary: The user is restricted.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.IsOperator
member.summary: Whether or not the user is an IRC operator.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.IsReceivingServerNotices
member.summary: The user can receive server notices. (Obsolete in RFC2812)

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.Channels
member.summary: The list of channels that the user is in.

member.name: P:NetIRC.User.Ranks
member.summary: A dictionary that contains the current ranks for the user in each of their channels.
